snippet.title: Classic Game Room HD - OUTLAW for Atari 2600 VCS review
snippet.description:
Classic Game Room was the FIRST classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999. Returning in 2008 with new episodes, Classic Game Room breaks out a review of OUTLAW for the Atari 2600. Do you know your enemy? This amazing shooting game for the VCS allows you to play as a cowboy, sheriff or outlaw blasting your pistol against an emeny of unspeakable evil. It's like a first or third person shooter except more intense. You fight on city streets crowded with wagons and in the Wild West around a cactus. This Spaghetti Western of a video game is like Outlaw Josey Wales meets Halo 3. You gotta play Outlaw because it's an amazing 1970's arcade retro old school vintage collectible cartridge that set the stage for competitive online shooting games today. Maybe they will release Outlaw on the Playstation 3 PS3 or Xbox 360 or Wii or Neo Geo or Turbografx-16. High Noon, OUTLAW!

Be sure to watch the original Classic Game Room episodes. Classic Game Room was the original classic video game review show on the Internet in 1999-2000, now on DVD. The HD series is reviewing PS3, Genesis, NES, Atari and Xbox 360. XBLA. Gun game. 1890's
